# YVAPE Program Portals - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack application for YVAPE program management with admin and student portals.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- NextAuth.js for magic link authentication
- Tailwind CSS
- React Email for email templates
- Resend for email delivery

## Project Structure
- `/app/admin` - Admin portal for school administrators
- `/app/student` - Student portal for program participants
- `/app/api` - API routes for data management
- `/emails` - React Email templates
- `/prisma` - Database schema and migrations
- `/components` - Shared React components
- `/lib` - Utility functions and configurations

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow Next.js 14 App Router conventions
- Implement server components by default
- Use Prisma for all database operations
- Maintain consistent YVAPE branding and styling

## Next Steps for You:
1. Set up PostgreSQL database
2. Copy .env.example to .env.local and fill in values
3. Run `npm run db:push` to create tables
4. Run `npm run dev` to start development server
5. Visit http://localhost:3000

See SETUP.md for detailed instructions!
